channel.title: Help adding master
channel.description:
Need help adding master, i'd like find the skill's myself and do the codes but i just need the starting code because, this is what im putting atm.
[code]else if (command.startsWith("master") && playerRights >= 2)) {[/code] I know that you gotta do addskills and stuff under that but i just need help with the else if to start the expression. when i do this code i get 3 errors

item.title: Help adding master
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights > 2) {
for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
addSkillXP(14000000, i);
}
}

For delta

Read full topic

item.title: Help adding master
item.dc:creator: @adamknightz adamknightz
item.description:
@adamknightz wrote:

If you’re using PI…

			if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) {
				for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
					c.playerLevel[i] = 99;
					c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
					c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);	
				}
				c.getPA().requestUpdates();
			}

If not using PI…I’m not sure, sorry.

Read full topic
